name: King Of Drift
description:
Drift with your car, achieve high drift score to get KING OF DRIFT medal and drive fast to get KING OF RACING medal.
In Drifting mode you have five achievements which you can get and the last one is KING OF DRIFT medal.
In Racing mode you have also five achievements and the last one is KING OF RACING medal.
You have available eleven vehicles for drift and for every new car you need pass drift score for that car and for every new track you need pass previous track.
Unlike many other similar games , King of Drift allows you to take a step forward and to participate in Drift mode and Race mode and to get the highest medal in each category.
Game is made for drifters and for racers where you can just drift alone and get KING OF DRIFT medal or to race against others and get KING OF RACING medal.
